tool_description: Details about the top rated video games 1995-2021
name: Top Video Games 1995-2021
title: Top Video Games 1995-2021

api_list.name: Get Game Info
api_list.description: This endpoint returns 100 results per page with the name, platform, release_date, summary, meta_score, and user_review score. Pages 0-187 allowed.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-video-games-1995-2021.p.rapidapi.com/0"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-video-games-1995-2021.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://top-video-games-1995-2021.p.rapidapi.com/{page}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-video-games-1995-2021.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
